DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study clinically evaluate potential cause contact lens-related dry eye .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Causes Contact Lens Related Dry Eye
DOC.detailed_description: Daily wear soft contact lens wearer report significant contact lens-related dryness symptom enrol . Late day dryness contact lens , intensity grade 3-5 , frequency `` sometimes / frequently / constantly '' evaluate questionnaire consider significant .
DOC.criteria: Reports lateday dryness symptom contact lens wear questionnaire . Wears FDA Group 2 hydrogel , FDA Group 4 hydrogel , silicone hydrogel lens . Consistently use either polyhexamethylene biguanide ( PHMB ) polyquaternium1 ( PQT ) contact lens care product ( i.e . > 6 month include 1 month immediately enrollment ) . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Wears daily disposable contact lens . Has significant symptom relate lens fit lens deposit . Requires concurrent ocular medication ( rewetting drop allow ) . Has use RestasisÂ® last 3 month . Wears punctal plug fit last 30 day . Has current systemic ocular abnormality , infection disease . Uses current systemic medication likely affect tear film , e.g . antihistamine , betaadrenergic blocker , steroid . Has history refractive surgery . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
